productAttributes.title: Petzl Elios 2 Multipurpose Helmet
productAttributes.productDescription: Swing into action for any game or sport and be prepared to take on tough competition with the Petzl Elios 2 Multipurpose Helmet. Use this helmet when you go skating, cycling, rock climbing or canyoning. Functions and Usability The Petzl Elios 2 Multipurpose Helmet is designed for senior sportsmen over the age of 15 who participate in a number of sports. The helmet is held in place with the help of the Y-shaped webbing straps and it also features a headband adjustment system. Benefits and Safety Features The Petzl Elios 2 Multipurpose Helmet is durable as the outer shell is made of ABS plastic while the inner shell contains comfort foam that helps reduce impact shock to the head. This helmet is well ventilated and also features additional sliding ventilation slots. Four clips are available on the helmet to attach a headlamp, which frees your hands to do more important actions. This lightweight helmet is washable.

productAttributes.title: SG Poly Fab Cricket Helmet - M
productAttributes.productDescription: Play cricket confidently and send the ball to the boundary in style to score those extra runs. Protect yourself with the right equipment and avoid being hurt by a fast ball during matches. Functions and Usability The SG Poly Fab Cricket Helmet is ideal for junior batsmen in the age group of 11 to 15 years. This helmet is solid and will ensure adequate protection for those intending to hone their skills at the batting nets. The outer shell of this SG helmet is made from polypropylene that is capable of withstanding the force of bouncer ball in order to protect your head. Benefits and Safety Features This medium sized SG Poly Fab Cricket Helmet features a moulded earpiece which ensures the ear is protected properly. The sweat absorbent and breathable inner padding make wearing this helmet during long matches comfortable. The steel grill in the front of the helmet protects the mouth and nose from injury.

productAttributes.title: Simond Calcit Light Camping & Hiking Helmet - L
productAttributes.productDescription: Hiking is an enjoyable but rigorous activity that calls for care and precaution. When you set out on one of your adventure hikes remember to strap on the Simond Calcit Light Camping & Hiking Helmet to prevent injury. Functions and Usability The Simond Calcit Light is an ultra-lightweight helmet ideal for rock climbing, via ferrata and mountaineering. The in-mold design ensures better protection while the five air vents on each side and single air vents in the front and rear render better aeration. The helmet has an adjustable headband that makes wearing the helmet easier. This hiking helmet is light on your head and in your backpack. Complying with the safety standards for climbing or mountaineering, cycling, skateboarding and rollerblading, the adult Calcit Light helmet is suitable for users aged 15 years and above. Simond is every adventure seeker’s go-to brand. Adhering to the highest levels of safety and quality, Simond presents a wide array climbing, canoeing, skiing and caving gear.

productAttributes.title: SG Poly Fab Cricket Helmet - XS
productAttributes.productDescription: As the proverb goes, it is better to be safe than sorry. The same applies in cricket especially when playing with the usual hard cricket ball. Get the right equipment for your children as they train to become the next big Indian cricketer. Functions and Usability The SG Poly Fab Cricket Helmet is designed for junior batsmen in the age group of 4 to 8 years who are just starting to get a feel of the game. The outer shell of this durable helmet is made from polypropylene and comes with an adjustable steel grill to protect the mouth and nose area. Benefits and Safety Features The extra small size of this SG Poly Fab Cricket is perfect for young children who need to spend time in the batting nets to hone their skills. The moulded earpiece in the helmet protects the ear from any severe impact. The sweat absorbent and breathable inner padding provide a comfortable experience while playing.

productAttributes.title: Albion Elite Premiere Cricket Helmet - S
productAttributes.productDescription: A cricket helmet is very necessary to ensure that your face and head is protected from any mishaps that might happen on the pitch. Functions and Usability The Albion Elite Premiere Cricket Helmet is designed to protect your full face and is ideal for beginner adult players. The outer shell is made of polypropylene which can take high impact and it comes with an EPS liner. Benefits and Safety Features The helmet comes with a supersoaker front pad to ensure that the sweat does not drip into your eyes and hinder your vision. It also has a quick release chin strap clip to keep it firmly in place during game play.

productAttributes.title: Bikenwear Novelty German Motorbike Helmet - L
productAttributes.productDescription: Helmets are worn mainly for the purpose of providing safety to the rider in case of accidents. However, novelty helmets are all about providing that basic protection with oodles of style. Bikenwear Novelty German Helmet carries the old-military-helmet appeal. This design is similar to the German military helmets of the past and should interest those who are fans of old military gear. It possesses a nylon Y-strap retention system with an adjustment pivot that does not meddle with the ears. The seam is sewn on the outside of the helmet to avoid chafing of the face.

You can concentrate better on your shots as you do not have to worry about sustaining injuries when hit by the ball. Made from strong materials, this helmet provides a sturdy protective cover to your head. You can play your favourite pull and hook shots off fast bouncers and short balls with confidence while wearing this helmet. The interior of the helmet has soft padding to protect the head from the shock of impact when hit by fast balls.

productAttributes.title: Daytona DOT German Motorsports Helmet - XL
productAttributes.productDescription: Made in the design similar to the World War I and II German military helmets, this DOT certified Daytona German Helmet will keep your head safe while riding. Nylon Y-strap D-ring Retention System Ensure that the helmet is stable on your head for a comfortable ride by fastening the straps with the D-ring buckle. Soft Touch The interior of this helmet is well padded to offer a soft feel and snug fit to help you ride comfortably. Moisture Wicking Fabric The special fabric lining used in the interior of this helmet wicks away sweat and keeps your head dry and comfortable.
